title: Rito, why did you change my waifu fedora?
body:
she was fine before ok, only noobs couldn't deal with her now she has this garbage ult which requires the enemy to stand still for half the match while you attack the damn circles around it, that's not how a duelist works, ok! the ability changes for her Q, W, and E are much better, but that ult is utter garbage and will not work. Why not make her next attack on a single target like a flurry of attacks like ww's ult, expect it doesnt suppress and is a skillshot in a direction and hits all enemies in the lined AoE. See that would be perfect, hire me pelase i would make better champs than most of your devs, thank you bless.

Jesus christ the new fedora is gonna be so bad, espeically when cancer like riven isn't nerfed, rito pls don't touch my waifu

edit

ok I made a high quality drawing to explain better.
http://i.gyazo.com/5ba6a813649847de5d7dd556135904c5.png

as you can see the red is the line AoE, which is a channeled ability, and does damage for each second they're in the AoE in, damage is higher the closer they are.

replies.body: So you want her to be pantheon?

By the looks of what I saw in the video, the AoE healing her ult gives is quite substantial. Plus, up to four opportunities to deal instant %Max HP damage and that's not even counting her other abilities. I think that she is still going to be a great duellist, albeit with slightly less kill potential. But she had two slows and a massive AoE heal, which gives her the utility that she really needed.

Tempt me once, fine. Tempt me twice, well. Just ask your waifu on what she thinks about it.

EDIT: Fiora Fedora, Fieodora, get it? No? Okay...
